personalInfo.name: Anubhab Debnath
personalInfo.title: Full Stack Web Developer & UI Designer

summary: Full-Stack Web Developer and UI Designer passionate about building scalable, user-centric applications. Experienced in React, TypeScript, and cloud deployment with AWS. Adept at collaborating in agile teams, mentoring peers, and delivering high-impact UI experiences. Seeking opportunities to contribute to innovative software solutions and grow with like-minded teams.

education.degree: Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science and Engineering

description: Contributed to the development of Agrishop, enhancing UI/UX on both web and mobile platforms.
Collaborated with senior designers and developers to build scalable UI components, reducing turnaround time by 15%.
Mentored junior UI and graphic designers, fostering design consistency and improved team efficiency by 35%.
Developed custom web applications for clients using React and Next.js.
Built robust backend systems with Node.js/Express and MongoDB/PostgreSQL.
Contributed to and maintained open-source projects on GitHub.

projects.name: Status Deck
projects.description: Live status dashboard for developer projects and uptime monitoring.
highlights: Built public dashboard with scheduled uptime checks
Uses Appwrite functions and automation for real-time status updates
Features recent activity and live project health indicators

projects.name: Learning Management System
projects.description: Modern LMS platform for educators and students, with payment, authentication, and robust course management.
highlights: Supports secure authentication with Clerk
Integrated Stripe payments for premium courses
AWS-powered media handling and cloud storage
Multi-role dashboards for teachers and students

projects.name: ImagineAI
projects.description: Fullstack AI-powered web app (Next.js) for generating, managing, and showcasing creative content.
highlights: Optimized frontend using Next.js and custom fonts
Demonstrates experience with database-driven applications
Built for scalable deployment on Vercel

highlights: Implements repository initialization, commits, and clone operations
Deep dive into Git internalsâ€”objects, protocols, and low-level commands

highlights: Supports parsing and creating DNS packets, handling records and recursive resolves
Hands-on experience with networking and protocols

projects.name: InkWell (MERN Blog Platform)

Hosted live on Render
